name: Patients Age 65 or Older in SNP or Long Term Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Identifies those in LT Care, limited life expectancy),(Data Element Scope: Exclusion),(Inclusion Criteria: G codes to identify those in LT Care),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)
